Package hogwartSim.interactions

Class InteractionAgent

java.lang.Object
hogwartSim.interactions.InteractionAgent
All Implemented Interfaces:
IInteractionAgent
public class InteractionAgent extends Object implements IInteractionAgent
The class responsible for interactions after movement (possibly accompanied with map it replaces class General)
